channel.title: Melissa Barrera on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Melissa Barrera on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Original ‘Scream 7’ Director Quit ‘About a Week’ After Melissa Barrera Got Fired but Didn’t Go Public Until Death Threats ‘Got Too Intense’: ‘The Script Was About Her’
item.description: Original “Scream 7” director Christopher Landon reveals in the new book “Your Favorite Scary Movie: How the Scream Films Rewrote the Rules of Horror” (via Entertainment Weekly)
